DOC.brief_summary: In study , 10 mg dose tasocitinib ( CP-690,550 ) give study subject three separate occasion use one three different tablet formulation ( tablet version ) time . The amount tasocitinib ( CP-690,550 ) available blood follow administration tablet formulation measure compare . DOC.brief_title: A Study To Compare The Amount Of Tasocitinib ( CP-690,550 ) That Is Absorbed Into The Blood Of Healthy Subjects Following Oral Administration Of Three Different Tablet Versions Of Tasocitinib ( CP-690,550 )
DOC.detailed_description: This pivotal bioequivalence study tasocitinib ( CP-690,550 ) .
DOC.criteria: Healthy male and/or female ( nonchildbearing potential ) subject age 21 55 year , inclusive . Body Mass Index ( BMI ) 17.5 30.5 kg/m2 ; total body weight male > 50 kg ( 110 lb ) . For female , total body weight > 45 kg ( 99 lb ) . No evidence active latent inadequately treated infection Mycobacterium tuberculosis ( TB ) . Evidence clinically significant illness , medical condition , disease . Evidence history clinically significant infection within past 3 month . Use tobacco nicotinecontaining product excess equivalent 5 cigarette per day .
